short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optionally hide listings on Craigslist with this utility

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of wading through Craigslist seeing the same postings over and over again? With this extension, you can quickly filter out the noise.

This utility enables a simple set of buttons to hide individual listings while browsing Craigslist.

It has been designed to seamlessly provide additional functionality without drastically altering Craiglist.
